sourcesContent:
import './style.scss' import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import { USER_MAIN_DATA } from '../../data/mocked-data' import { Modelisation } from '../../data/Modelisation' import useFetch from '../../hooks/useFetch' //IMPORT IMAGES import caloriesImg from '../../assets/calories-icon.png' import proteinesImg from '../../assets/protein-icon.png' import glucidesImg from '../../assets/carbs-icon.png' import lipidesImg from '../../assets/fat-icon.png' const calories = 'Calories' const proteines = 'Protéines' const glucides = 'Glucides' const lipides = 'Lipides' function Energie({ userId }) { const { data, error } = useFetch( `http://localhost:3000/user/${userId}`, getUserDataMockWithId() ) function getUserDataMockWithId() { const userData = USER_MAIN_DATA.find((user) => +user.id === +userId) return userData } function getData() { const modelisation = new Modelisation(data) return modelisation.formatDataEnergy() } if (data !== null) { return (
{/* toLocaleString pour séparation des milliers */}

{`${getData().calorieCount.toLocaleString('en-IN')} kCal`}

{calories}

{`${getData().proteinCount}g`}

{proteines}

{`${getData().carbohydrateCount}g`}

{glucides}

{`${getData().lipidCount}g`}

{lipides}

 ) } } export default Energie
